properties.name: Message
properties.value: The process of test-driven development(TDD) involves writing your tests before any code. It acts as a plan for the code you intend to write and validates its completion

properties.name: Message
properties.value: If every class or module of a program is responsibile for only one part of functionality of a program, it has adhered to the Single Responsibility Principle

properties.name: Message
properties.value: Synchronous behaviour is when a program is executed line by line but it waits for functions to complete and return a value

properties.name: Message
properties.value: CRUD stands for Create, Read, Update, Delete
